t: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah.
His*p foundation is in the holy mountains.
The*p Lord*s loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious*p things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
I*p will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
And*p of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
The*p Lord*s shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
As*p well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
